title: Copies - Outside the UK
question: How many copies of the grant do you need for use outside the UK?
bullet2: 50 pence for every copy after that

invalid.summary: You haven’t entered a valid number

required.summary: Enter the number of copies you need for outside the UK
required.message: Enter the number of copies you need for outside the UK. Enter ‘0’ if you don’t need any international copies.
